name: swirling
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
moving quickly with a twisting, circular movement, or seeming to do this: The audience seemed at times to be a single swirling mass. The swirling patterns of the carpet and soft furnishings came as rather a shock.
More examplesFewer examplesI peered down at the swirling jet-black water.The birds were partly hidden in the swirling sea mist.Break the eggs one at a time and drop them carefully into the swirling water.The rain was driven every which way by a swirling wind.
